[url]: the url to rip from, default: https://www.startpagina.nl/
--save, -s: specifies which file to save to, default data.json
--limit, -l: limit the amount of headers you get, default 100(too much in most cases)
--min-links: sets the minimum amount of links needed for one header, default 3
--max-links: sets the maximum amount of links needed for one header, default 7
